1.caption_en:
A circular "Discover & Launch" workflow diagram showing an "Initiate" entry on the left, a "Sustainable Platform" endpoint on the right, and connected nodes for Market, Business, Context, Need & Problem, Solution, Team, Governance, Unfair Advantage, and Minimal Viable Platform.

3.caption_en:
A dark teal rounded rectangular badge with centered white uppercase text reading "SUSTAINABLE PLATFORM" stacked on two lines. The left side features small rounded tabs, giving a speech-bubble–like appearance.
